newsitem.title: USA: U.S. ammonia, DAP prices steady in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. ammonia, DAP prices steady in quiet trade.

text.p: Prices for diammonium phosphate (DAP) and ammonia were unchanged from Friday in lackluster dealings, cash sources said.
"We're nearing the end of planting, so the next thing to watch is what happens on the international front, a cash dealer said.
